headline.print_headline: A Drug Czar Who Knows Addiction Firsthand
headline.main: Michael Botticelli Is a Drug Czar Who Knows Addiction Firsthand

snippet: He is the first person in substance-abuse recovery to hold the position of director of the White House Office of National Drug Control Policy.
abstract: Michael Botticelli is first person in substance-abuse recovery program to hold position of director of White House Office of National Drug Control Policy, or drug czar; Botticelli's appointment points to lessening stigma around addiction and beginnings of shift from punitive approach to drug abuse to one based on healing.
